jp.innovationplus.ipp.client での IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition の使用
 

IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition を返す jp.innovationplus.ipp.client のメソッド
 IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition.and()
          and : Add "AND" operator to "query" parameter.
 IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition.eq(java.lang.String fieldName, java.lang.Object value)
          eq : Add "EQUALS" query parameter "query".
 IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition.setBound(double top, double bottom, double left, double right)
          setBound : Add query parameter "bound"
 IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition.setBoundByRadiusSquare(double centerLatitude, double centerLongitude, int radiusSquare)
          setBoundByRadiusSquare : Add query parameter "latlon", "radiusSquare"
 IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition.setCount(int count)
          setCount : Add query parameter "count"
 IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition.setGeolocationLimit(int limitCount)
          setGeolocationLimit : Add query parameter "geolocationLimit"
 IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition.setSelf()
          setSelf : Add query parameter "self"
 IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition.setSince(long since)
          setSince : Add query parameter "since"
 IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition IPPGeoResourceClient.QueryCondition.setUntil(long until)
          setUntil : Add query parameter "until"
